FuncDef: This command associates an IP exception filter policy with an NGE-enabled router interface to allow packets matching the exception criteria to transit the NGE domain as clear text.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP exception filter policy. The IP exception ID or exception name must have already been created. Values-1 to 6553, filter-name (64 characters maximum).
Binds the exception filter policy in the inbound direction.
Binds the exception filter policy in the outbound direction.

ExtraInfo: Default: no ip-exception direction inboundno ip-exception direction outbound
